author: Shea Donovan, Tom O'Connor
title: Russia's Surgical Airstrikes Keeping Military Assets Intact for Future Use
description: Satellite images from space technology company Maxar Technologies reveal surgical airstrikes that appear designed to preserve key military assets.
content: Satellite imagery received Thursday by Newsweek has begun to reveal the aftermath of Russia's ongoing military campaign against Ukraine, showing visible damage to Ukrainian military facilities as Rusâ€¦ [+4050 chars]
